From the brand

The Technology That Cares

PETKIT is a high-tech company founded in 2013,committed to developing an all-in-one solution through the product line consisting of “eat,drink,clean,sleep,and fun” to encourage an intelligent life with your fur pal.

PETKIT proudly creates elegant,sustainable,and cost-effective products that won Red Dot Design Award,iF Design Award,and a number of patents,which have provided to over 30 countries all over the world.

PURA MAX AUTOMATIC CAT LITTER BOX

PURA X AUTOMATIC CAT LITTER BOX

AUTOMATIC PET FEEDERS

PET WATER FOUNTAINS

PET BACKPACK CARRIERS

ACCESSORIES

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 15, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ PETKIT
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B083DM9XN9

Ultra-quiet pump(below 30dB),low energy consumption,gives you and your pets 100% sweet sleep
Smart LED Indicator Light remind you the fountain working status.SMART and NORMAL mode are available
Triple Filtration System provides healthy, fresh and oxygen-enriched water for your pets
Note:Powered with USB cable (5V adapter not included) and Pump is replaceable










Intuitive to monitor

The built-in led light reminds you of the fountain’s working status, such as water shortage and filter replacement.

Auto shut-off for protection

The pump will automatically shut off when the water storage level is too low.

Easy to clean

The pump is detachable, replaceable, and very easy to clean.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $54.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 02:11:02 UTC – Details)

From the brand

About HISEA:

HISEA is a company specializing in the production of outdoor wear. In order to produce perfect outdoor products, HISEA strives to make every detail of each product take into account your needs.

Women’s Waterproof Rain Boots

Men’s Waterproof Rain Boots

What problem are we solving?

We are a global brand. Our mission and purpose that guides us in everything we do is to resolve the problem of people’s necessities for work and life, defense against outdoor elements, inspire the dream of a better life for you.

What makes our products unique?

Our products are versatile and functional, easy to take care of. All kinds of products are ranged from men, women to children.

HISEA pre sales & after sales servie?

We love our customers; we provide 24h free contact service and a lifetime quality response of our products.

HISEA Rubber Rain Boots

100% WaterproofInsulatedFlexible

Women’s EVA Hunting boots

Men’s Rubber Rain Boots

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13.94 x 12.71 x 4.8 inches; 2.8 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 15, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ OneStone
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08B5S8RSS

HISEA women’s garden boots give outdoors lovers all the lightweight performance and 100% waterproof protection. They are designed to be one of the most VERSATILE STYLES, an ideal for where there is mud, slush or rain.
These women’s gardening boots provide 100% Waterproof. 5mm four-way stretch nylon flex-foam boots and high-grade rubber overlays keep feet dry and warm, and providing comfort and support for long time standing.
Lightweight, breathable 2mm H-Airmesh lining allows the air to travel throughout the boots, which keeps your feet much dryer than normal boots. The air mesh is what keeps high-end running shoes cool and dry under intense use. Comfort rated from subfreezing temperatures to 86 °F/30 °C. Best for year-round use.
Roll them down to let inner delicate floral printing outside, they become shoes immediately! These superior boots offer all day comfort wherever you go, they are features an aggressive non-slip sole, shedding debris easily. A removable molded EVA sock liner and reinforced rubber shell provide additional protection to achilles, heel and toe.
PLEASE MIND THE SIZE CHART AND CHOOSE THE RIGHT SIZE BEFORE BUYING! We love our buyers; Boots come with a FREE gift. One Year Quality Assurance Backed By HISEA!

Read more

Breathable air-mesh lining allows air to travel throughout the boots.

Durable rubber layers for additional protection to heel and toe.

Roll them down to let inner delicate floral outside.

5 mm neoprene upper keeps you warm & comfortable.

Read more

100% waterproof, lightweight and flexible.

Non-slip durable molded rubber outsoles.

Sealed rubber shell extends up above ankle.

Year-round use; Best for muck mud working, gardening, fishing, hiking, riding and farming.

You can move the mouse around easily and the pad shapes it well. Moreover, the reinforced edges can efficiently prevent deformation and damage to guarantee long time use.
Environmental Material : Made of soft smooth breathable material and non-deformable momory form, it is no-toxic, no any chemicals safe to use. More important, unlike other moused pads on the market, our mouse pads have no any bad smells!

Protects Your Wrists : With raised ergonomic soft memory form design, it will provide good touch and effective support to your wrist. Keep arms, wrists, and hands from getting sore while using the computer, maximum reduce wrist stress and tiredness.

Product Description

GARDENING GLOVES WITH FIVE COLOR FOR CHOOSING

WHY CHOOSING OUR GARDENING GLOVES?

These fashion gardening gloves with floral design that be a great gift to your family people, flexible, comfortable and durable, it will help to protects your hands from scratches or blisters. These working gloves make you feel comfortable and working more convenient and enjoyable.

UNIQUE DESIGN

Breathable Material

Our gardening gloves has moisture wicking layers inside keep your hands sweat free, you can work easily and freely even in summer.

Stab Proof

Sturdy, high-quality material will protect you from stab wounds while working in the garden.

Elastic cuff

Elasticated cuffs for easy on and off, keep you from falling and feeling uncomfortable even if you wear it for a long time.

Touch Screen Design

Touch screen finger design allows you to take calls without removing gloves while working in the garden.

USE ON MULTIPLE OCCASSIONS

GARDENING

Flexiable, protect your hands from injury, it absorbs perspiration and keeps your hands cool.

WORKING

Lightweight and Easy to us, very convenient in your work,easy to wear, not feel discomfort at work, the one size fits all ladies.

CLEANING

Foam padded palm patch can protects your hands from scratches or blisters in long time cleaning.

DO GARDEN WORKING TOGETHER WITH YOUR FAMILY MEMBERS

GIFTS FOR GARDENERS – The gardening gloves for women are suitable for gardening working, like pruning, weed pulling, planting, picking, cleaning the garden, and so forth.
